tooltip.block.thermalpaste_ore: This block drops between 1, and 4 thermal paste. Found anywhere in the overworld, in stone patches.
tooltip.block.thermalpaste_deepslate_ore: This block drops between 1, and 4 thermal paste. Found anywhere in the overworld, in deepslate patches.
tooltip.block.thermalpaste_raw_block: This is used to save space for raw thermal space in inventories. Combine raw thermal paste in a 3x3 grid to obtain this block.
tooltip.block.thermalpaste_block: This is used to save space for raw thermal space in inventories. Combine thermal paste in a 3x3 grid to obtain this block.
tooltip.block.machineblock: The block that is the cornerstone of the entire mod. Most machines and blocks will use this machine block.
tooltip.block.clicklight_white: A toggleable light with either redstone, or by rightclicking it. This is an asthetic tweak for people who need it.
tooltip.item.thermalpaste_raw: Smelt the raw thermal paste in order to get thermal paste.
tooltip.item.thermalpaste: Craft with an empty tube to create a full tube of thermal paste.
tooltip.item.thermalpaste_tube: Allthough empty, this was once used to make machines cool down. Craft it with thermal paste to make a full tube.
tooltip.item.thermalpaste_tube_full: this is used to make machines cool down.
